trans-unit.source: Manages the view state of ASP.NET server controls, including pages.
trans-unit.target: 管理 ASP.NET 服务器控件，包括页面的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: View state for a page or control is the cumulative property values, or view, of that page or control.
trans-unit.target: 页或控件的视图状态是累积的属性值或视图，该页面或控件。

trans-unit.source: You can access this class through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问通过此类<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Controls can also store essential state information in control state, but that information is not stored as a StateBag object.
trans-unit.target: 控件可以还将基本状态信息存储在控件状态，但该信息将不被视为 StateBag 对象。

trans-unit.source: This class is the primary storage mechanism for all HTML and Web server controls.
trans-unit.target: 此类是所有的 HTML 和 Web 服务器控件的主存储机制。

trans-unit.source: It stores attribute/value pairs as strings associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 它将属性/值对存储为与控件关联的字符串。

trans-unit.source: It tracks changes to these attributes only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A> method is executed for a page request, and saves the changes to the page's or control's view state.
trans-unit.target: 它跟踪对这些属性的更改之后才<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A>方法执行页请求，并将所做的更改保存到的页面的或控件的视图状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class implements a dictionary, and you can add items to it or remove items from it as you would any dictionary object.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现一个字典，并可以向其添加项或从中删除项，就像任何字典对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about data collections, such as dictionaries, see [Collections and Data Structures](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息数据集合，如字典，请参阅[集合和数据结构](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor for this class.
trans-unit.target: 这是此类的默认构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> class that allows stored state values to be case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>类，该类允许存储状态的值不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to ignore case; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要忽略大小写;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateItem"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 添加新<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateItem"></xref>对象传递给<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: If the item already exists in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object, this method updates the value of the item.
trans-unit.target: 如果该项已存在于<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>对象，此方法将更新项的值。

trans-unit.source: The attribute name for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 属性名称<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the item to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到的项的值<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateItem"></xref> that represents the object added to view state.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateItem"></xref>表示添加到视图状态的对象。

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 从当前中移除所有项<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateItem"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取数<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateItem"></xref>中的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中的项的数目<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates over all the key/value pairs of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateItem"></xref> objects stored in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回的枚举数循环访问的所有键/值对<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateItem"></xref>对象存储在<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator to iterate through the state bag.
trans-unit.target: 枚举数循环访问状态包。

trans-unit.source: Checks a <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateItem"></xref> object stored in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object to evaluate whether it has been modified since the call to <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TrackViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateItem"></xref>对象存储在<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>对象来评估是否在调用已被修改<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TrackViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This method also returns `false` if the `key` parameter does not exist in the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法也返回`false`如果`key`中不存在参数<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>

trans-unit.source: The key of the item to check.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的项的键。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item has been modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已修改了该项;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of an item stored in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置中存储的项的值<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Using this member is the simplest way to save and retrieve view-state values for a control or a page.
trans-unit.target: 使用此成员是保存和检索的控件或网页的视图状态值的最简单方法。

trans-unit.source: If an item is not already stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> object when you set this property, its key/value pair is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个项不存储在<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>对象时设置此属性，其键/值对添加到集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `null` before the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TrackViewState%2A> method is called on an item, it is removed from the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为`null`之前<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TrackViewState%2A>在项上调用方法，则将删除从<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TrackViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, when you set this property to `null` the key is saved to allow tracking of the item's view state.
trans-unit.target: 否则为当此属性设置为`null`密钥将保存，以便能够跟踪项的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The key for the item.
trans-unit.target: 项的键。

trans-unit.source: The specified item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 中的指定的项<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of keys representing the items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示中的项的键的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: These keys are the names of the control properties.
trans-unit.target: 这些密钥是控件属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you created a `BGColor` property on a `Table` control that you customized, a `BGColor` entry is created in this collection representing that property on your `Table` control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你创建`BGColor`属性`Table`你自定义，控件`BGColor`该属性表示在此集合中创建条目你`Table`控件。

trans-unit.source: These keys correspond to the names of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateItem> objects stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> collection for the current page or server control.
trans-unit.target: 这些密钥对应的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.StateItem>对象存储在<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>当前页或服务器控件的集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateItem>

trans-unit.source: You can iterate over this collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以循环访问此集合使用<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The collection of keys.
trans-unit.target: 键的集合。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified key/value pair from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将从指定的键/值对中移除<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The item to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的项。

trans-unit.source: Sets the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object as well as the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection.Dirty*> property of each of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateItem"></xref> objects contained by it.
trans-unit.target: 设置的状态<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>对象以及<xref:System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection.Dirty*>的每个属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateItem"></xref>它所含对象</xref:System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection.Dirty*>

trans-unit.source: The SetDirty method is used to force the collection and its contents to be serialized during a call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: SetDirty 方法用于强制集合和其内容以进行序列化到的调用期间<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to mark the state of the collection and its items as modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要将标记的集合和为已修改; 其项的状态否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection.Dirty*> property for the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateItem"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 集<xref:System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection.Dirty*>属性指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateItem"></xref>对象在<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection.Dirty*>

trans-unit.source: The SetItemDirty method is used to prevent or force state management of specific properties, represented by <xref:System.Web.UI.StateItem> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> collection.
trans-unit.target: SetItemDirty 方法用于阻止或强制所表示的特定属性的状态管理<xref:System.Web.UI.StateItem>中的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateItem>

trans-unit.source: The key that identifies which <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateItem"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> to set.
trans-unit.target: 标识其中的键<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateItem"></xref>中<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>设置。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to mark the state of the item as modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要将项的状态标记为已修改;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>接口。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>这是从<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>复制的元素的目标</xref:System.Array>的一维

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>必须具有从零开始的索引。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 中的从零开始索引`array`复制开始处。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>接口。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果访问<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>是同步的 （线程安全）; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: 可以用于<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>对访问进行同步的对象

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>要用作添加元素的键</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to use as the value of the element to add.

trans-unit.target: 要查找中的键<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>对象。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> contains an element with the key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: 要获取的元素的键。

trans-unit.target: 使用指定的元素 key 。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Remove*>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Remove*>。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary.Remove*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>接口。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>

trans-unit.source: The key of the element to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的元素的键。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>接口。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>可用于循环访问集合。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether state changes are being tracked.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否正在跟踪状态更改。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> is marked to save changes to its state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>标记以保存对其状态更改; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Restores the previously saved view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 还原的以前保存的视图状态<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This method restores view-state information for the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> object from a previous page request that was saved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法还原视图状态信息<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>对象从已保存的上一个页面请求<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>

trans-unit.source: This method is primarily used by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: You can override this method to control how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写此方法，以控制自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> state to restore.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，表示<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>要还原状态。

trans-unit.source: Saves the changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 将保存的更改<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>自页回发到服务器的时间的对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is primarily used by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties.
trans-unit.target: 视图状态是服务器控件的属性的值的累计。

trans-unit.source: These values are automatically placed in the server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class.
trans-unit.target: 这些值会自动放在服务器控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>属性，它是<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>类</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>的实例</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 保存状态的服务器控件生命周期阶段后，此属性的值随后会保存到一个字符串对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB: ASP.NET Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1)。

trans-unit.source: When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `Hidden` element.
trans-unit.target: 视图状态保存时，此字符串对象返回到客户端作为变量存储在 HTML`Hidden`元素。

trans-unit.source: When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在创作自定义服务器控件时，你可以通过重写此方法并修改你的服务器控件的提高效率<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1) and [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB: ASP.NET Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e18eb2f2-cf00-47ae-b1a1-dfc188a6dea1)和[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the changes to the view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含视图状态的更改的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If there are no changes, or there are no <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateItem"></xref> elements in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有任何更改，或者有没有<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateItem"></xref>中的元素<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"> </xref>，此方法返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Causes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object to track changes to its state so that it can be persisted across requests.
trans-unit.target: 导致<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>对象可以跟踪对其状态的更改，以便它可以请求之间得以保持。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the view-state values stored in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取的视图状态的值存储在集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This is a collection that contains the values for all the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateItem> objects in the specified page or control.
trans-unit.target: 这是所有包含的值的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.StateItem>指定的页或控件中的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.StateItem>

trans-unit.source: You can iterate through these values by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用循环访问这些值<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The collection of view-state values.
trans-unit.target: 视图状态的值的集合。
